entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is trying to escape from Bellatrix and is using the lift to move around the Atrium.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A villainous character who is trying to evade Harry. She is using magic spells to try and harm him.

entities.name: atrium
entities.description: A large hall or room where the events of the story are taking place. It has a lift, grilles, statues, and wrought gold gates.

entities.name: fountain of magical brethren
entities.description: A feature in the Atrium where Harry takes cover from Bellatrix's spells. It is a statue or monument with some kind of magical significance.

relationships.description: Harry is currently in the Atrium, trying to escape from Bellatrix. He uses the lift to move around the hall.
Bellatrix is also in the Atrium, trying to evade Harry and using magic spells to harm him.
Harry is being attacked by Bellatrix with magic spells. He tries to dodge behind the Fountain of Magical Brethren to avoid her spells.
Harry takes cover behind the Fountain of Magical Brethren to avoid Bellatrix's spells. He uses this location as a temporary hiding place.
Bellatrix is attacking Harry with magic spells, trying to harm him and prevent him from escaping.
